text: Hi kids!
Guess who's here
Yes its me bob..
Join me for learning street with bob
“Hey Kids! Let me tell you what I do on  the different days of the week!”

M m m m m m m m  Monday
M m m m m m m m  Monday!
I’m going to the school Where I meet
Lots of friends and feel very cool
T t t t t t t t Tuesday T t t t t t t t Tuesday

I go for swimming class I’ll have a race 
With my friendsAnd see who is fast

W w w w w w w w Wednesday
W w w w w w w w Wednesday

I like to play sportsWe can go 
Horse riding And even row boats

Th th th th th th th th Thursday
Th th th th th th th th Thursday
Let’s bake a tasty cakeWe can bake another If we make a mistake
THURSDAY

F f f f f f f f Friday
F f f f f f f f Friday

I’ll finish my homework That’s because 
The weekend Is coming with lots of perks

S s s s s s s s Saturday
S s s s s s s s Saturday

I want to play with all my friends
It’s so much fun That I wish
The weekend never ends

S s s s s s s s Sunday
S s s s s s s s Sunday

It’s been such a long week I want to 
Just relax and get lots of sleep
“Goodbye Kids! I’m going to take a long nap!”
